title: Software Engineer - Backend
description:
**About Roma :** 




  





 Roma is building the stablecoin infrastructure layer for enterprise payments and treasury management. We enable businesses to move money globally in real\\-time at dramatically lower costs by bridging traditional finance with tokenized assets and stablecoins.
 



  





 Founded by Amit Jain (former Managing Director at Sequoia Capital and APAC Head at Uber), Roma is backed by world\\-class investors and trusted by leading global enterprises including DoorDash, Binance, Solana Foundation, and Noon.
 



  





**What We Do :** 




  





 Roma provides three core infrastructure products:
 



  




* **Stablecoin Orchestration:** 
 A single API to send, receive, convert, and store stablecoins across multiple blockchains and protocols
* **Enterprise\\-Grade Payments:** 
 Unified global payouts API with 100\\+ bank and payment service provider integrations supporting both fiat and stablecoin rails
* **Treasury Management:** 
 Consolidated visibility and control across all bank accounts, PSPs, stablecoin wallets, and tokenized investment accounts.



  





 We're at an inflection point in financial infrastructure. Stablecoins and tokenized assets are transitioning from emerging technology to essential components of the global financial system. Roma is positioned at the forefront of this transformation, enabling enterprises to operate seamlessly across fiat and digital asset rails.
 



  





**What you'll do :** 




  




* Designing, developing, and maintaining high\\-quality, secure, software solutions that adhere to basic engineering principles such as Gang of Four principles, SOLID, and DRY.
* Collaborating with functional teams to understand requirements and translate them into technical designs and implementation plans.
* Utilising your expertise in our engineering stack, which includes Golang, Redis, message queues like Kafka and Pubsub, Kubernetes (K8s), and job schedulers.
* Shipping technically robust, scalable, and extendable platforms by applying best practices and ensuring code quality through testing, code reviews, and continuous integration.
* Identifying and resolving performance bottlenecks and other technical issues to ensure optimal system performance.
* Staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies, and actively contributing to the improvement of our engineering practices.



  





**Qualifications Required:** 




  




* 3\\-6 years of experience as a Software Engineer, with a strong track record of shipping technically robust, scalable, and extendable platforms
* Strong grasp of basic engineering principles, including Gang of Four principles, SOLID, and DRY
* Proficiency in our engineering stack: Go Lang, Redis, Kafka/Pub/Sub, Kubernetes (K8s), and job schedulers.
* Proven ability to solve complex technical problems and make sound technical decisions
* Excellent communication skills and ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams.
* Customer\\-obsessed mindset with a passion for simplifying complex problems in the fintech space.
* Demonstrated empathy and strong teamwork skills, fostering a collaborative and supportive work environment.



  





**Good to have:** 




  




* You are an entrepreneur at heart, i.e you are not only excited about startups but also really understand what it is like to work in one
* You are excited to learn new things and do not shy away from going above and beyond the traditional growth paths. You have strong communication skills.
* You can quickly adapt to the changing environment and are quick to pick up new skills if required to get the job done.
* You have the ability to break down a problem into smaller chunks and the ability to balance between the big picture and tactical activities.
